## Access to a dataset in Yoda
The accessibility of a dataset is stated below the title.
![Accessibility](/public/yoda-dataset-access.png)

### Explanation

#### Accessibility: Open - freely
You are free to download the dataset. Check the licence stated in the metadata for conditions of re-use. 
![License](/public/yoda-dataset-license.png)
If the licence is _Custom_ look for a file called `License.txt` in the dataset.

#### Accessibility: Restricted - available upon request
Please contact the [VU Research Data Management Support Desk](../topics/rdm-support-desk.qmd) at [rdm@vu.nl](mailto:rdm@vu.nl) to request access to the dataset. The RDM Support Desk can then provide more details about the conditions under which the dataset may be reused and what information is needed to evaluate your request.

#### Accessibility: Closed
The dataset is highly confidential, its contents cannot be disclosed.
